description:
Even powerful testing tools go unused. Drawing from years maintaining Python testing infrastructure, this talk explores why adoption is a social problem needing technical solutions.We'll examine the gap between what's possible (property-based testing, coverage-guided fuzzing) and what developers actually use. The challenge isn't building better tools – it's making them accessible.For developers who want advanced testing to be not just possible, but practical.


For more information, see https://pybay.org/

Follow us on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/pybay
title: No, seriously, why don't we use better testing tools?
